verses.verse: ( Give Ear to My Words) לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster, אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to be accompanied by הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת <WH5155> han·nə·ḥî·lō·wṯ flutes. מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz·mō·wr A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David. אֲמָרַ֖י <WH561> ’ă·mā·ray to my words, הַאֲזִ֥ינָה׀ <WH238> ha·’ă·zî·nāh Give ear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD; בִּ֣ינָה <WH995> bî·nāh consider הֲגִֽיגִי׃ <WH1901> hă·ḡî·ḡî my groaning.

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ <WH7181> haq·šî·ḇāh Attend to לְק֬וֹל <WH6963> lə·qō·wl the sound שַׁוְעִ֗י <WH7773> šaw·‘î of my cry, מַלְכִּ֥י <WH4428> mal·kî my King וֵאלֹהָ֑י <WH430> wê·lō·hāy and my God, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH413> ’ê·le·ḵā to You אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃ <WH6419> ’eṯ·pal·lāl I pray.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, בֹּ֭קֶר <WH1242> bō·qer In the morning, תִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> tiš·ma‘ You hear קוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> qō·w·lî my voice; בֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> bō·qer at daybreak אֶֽעֱרָךְ־ <WH6186> ’e·‘ĕ·rāḵ- I lay [my plea] לְ֝ךָ֗ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) before You וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃ 6822 Conj-w│V-Piel-ConjImperf-1cs ( wa·’ă·ṣap·peh) and wait in expectation.

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> kî For לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō are not אֵֽל־ <WH410> ’êl- a God חָפֵ֘ץ <WH2655> ḥā·p̄êṣ who delights רֶ֥שַׁע׀ <WH7562> re·ša‘ in wickedness; אָ֑תָּה <WH859> ’āt·tāh You לֹ֖א <WH3808> lō no יְגֻרְךָ֣ <WH1481> yə·ḡur·ḵā can dwell with You. רָֽע׃ <WH7451> rā‘ evil

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- cannot יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <WH3320> yiṯ·yaṣ·ṣə·ḇū stand הֽ֭וֹלְלִים <WH1984> hō·wl·lîm The boastful לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> lə·ne·ḡeḏ ... עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> ‘ê·ne·ḵā in Your presence; שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ <WH8130> nê·ṯā You hate כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> pō·‘ă·lê workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> ’ā·wen of iniquity.

תְּאַבֵּד֮ <WH6> tə·’ab·bêḏ You destroy דֹּבְרֵ֪י <WH1696> dō·ḇə·rê those who tell כָ֫זָ֥ב <WH3577> ḵā·zāḇ lies; אִישׁ־ <WH376> ’îš- the man דָּמִ֥ים <WH1818> dā·mîm of bloodshed וּמִרְמָ֗ה <WH4820> ū·mir·māh and deceit. יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב׀ <WH8581> yə·ṯā·‘êḇ abhors יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> wa·’ă·nî But I בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> bə·rōḇ by the abundance חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> ḥas·də·ḵā of Your loving devotion; ( Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.) אָב֣וֹא <WH935> ’ā·ḇō·w will enter בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> ḇê·ṯe·ḵā Your house אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <WH7812> ’eš·ta·ḥă·weh I will bow down אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- toward הֵֽיכַל־ <WH1964> hê·ḵal- temple. קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <WH6944> qāḏ·šə·ḵā Your holy בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3374> bə·yir·’ā·ṯe·ḵā in reverence

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, נְחֵ֬נִי <WH5148> nə·ḥê·nî Lead me, בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ <WH6666> ḇə·ṣiḏ·qā·ṯe·ḵā in Your righteousness לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an because of שׁוֹרְרָ֑י <WH8324> šō·wr·rāy my enemies; הוֹשַׁר <WH3474> hō·šar make straight לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nay before me. דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃ <WH1870> dar·ke·ḵā Your way

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî For אֵ֪ין <WH369> ’ên not a word בְּפִ֡יהוּ <WH6310> bə·p̄î·hū they speak נְכוֹנָה֮ <WH3559> nə·ḵō·w·nāh can be trusted; קִרְבָּ֪ם <WH7130> qir·bām [lies] within them. הַ֫וּ֥וֹת <WH1942> haw·wō·wṯ destruction קֶֽבֶר־ <WH6913> qe·ḇer- graves; פָּת֥וּחַ <WH6605> pā·ṯū·aḥ are open גְּרוֹנָ֑ם <WH1627> gə·rō·w·nām Their throats לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> lə·šō·w·nām their tongues יַחֲלִֽיקוּן׃ <WH2505> ya·ḥă·lî·qūn practice deceit. ( Or flattery; cited in )

הַֽאֲשִׁימֵ֨ם׀ <WH816> ha·’ă·šî·mêm Declare them guilty, אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕlō·hîm O God; יִפְּלוּ֮ <WH5307> yip·pə·lū let them fall מִֽמֹּעֲצ֪וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH4156> mim·mō·‘ă·ṣō·w·ṯê·hem by their own devices. בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> bə·rōḇ for their many פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם <WH6588> piš·‘ê·hem transgressions, הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ <WH5080> had·dî·ḥê·mōw Drive them out כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- for מָ֥רוּ <WH4784> mā·rū they have rebelled בָֽךְ׃ Prep│2ms ( ḇāḵ) against You.

וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ <WH8055> wə·yiś·mə·ḥū rejoice; כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl But let all ח֪וֹסֵי <WH2620> ḥō·w·sê who take refuge בָ֡ךְ Prep│2ms ( ḇāḵ) in You לְעוֹלָ֣ם 5769 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·‘ō·w·lām) .... יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ 7442 V-Piel-Imperf-3mp ( yə·ran·nê·nū) let them ever shout for joy וְתָסֵ֣ךְ 5526 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConjImperf-2ms ( wə·ṯā·sêḵ) May You shelter עָלֵ֑ימוֹ 5921 Prep│3mp ( ‘ā·lê·mōw) them, וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ 5970 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjImperf-3mp ( wə·ya‘·lə·ṣū) may rejoice בְ֝ךָ֗ Prep│2ms ( ḇə·ḵā) in You. אֹהֲבֵ֥י 157 V-Qal-Prtcpl-mpc ( ’ō·hă·ḇê) that those who love שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ 8034 N-msc│2ms ( šə·me·ḵā) Your name

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- For surely אַתָּה֮ <WH859> ’at·tāh You, תְּבָרֵ֪ךְ <WH1288> tə·ḇā·rêḵ bless צַ֫דִּ֥יק <WH6662> ṣad·dîq the righteous; יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה <WH6793> kaṣ·ṣin·nāh with the shield רָצ֥וֹן <WH7522> rā·ṣō·wn of Your favor. תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5849> ta‘·ṭə·ren·nū You surround them
